text: tilawin ijewoen, kkes ed taklatin nnwen. D Oebbi i wen Iuran. Ieell awen, deffir waya, a ppezhum s wayla nnwen, s lewqama, macci s lemveooa. Tid, segsent, ukud tezham, fket asent arrazen nnsent, d aeeppem. Ur illi u$ilif fellawen deg wayen i$ef temwafaqem, deffir ueeppem. Oebbi, s tidep, Izga d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
